function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Introduction of 6G technology","Impact":"Potential disruption of current 5G technology installations and applications","Mitigation":"Careful planning and coordination of the transition from 5G to 6G","Technologies":"6G technology, transition planning","People":"Operators, developers, users","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, technology developers"},{"Description":"Disruption of wireless technology installation and application due to COVID-19","Impact":"Decrease in connectivity and technological advancement during the pandemic","Mitigation":"Investment in remote technologies and infrastructure, prioritizing connectivity solutions for at-home society","Technologies":"Remote technologies, infrastructure development","People":"At-home society, businesses, telecommunication companies","Owner":"Governments, businesses, telecommunication companies"},{"Description":"Major shift to at-home work and self-isolated society in developed countries","Impact":"Increased demand for remote technologies and infrastructure, potential strain on existing systems","Mitigation":"Investment in remote work infrastructure, digital collaboration tools, and technology upgrades","Technologies":"Remote work infrastructure, digital collaboration tools","People":"At-home workers, businesses, technology providers","Owner":"Governments, businesses, technology providers"}]}
